job_description:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com


Job Description ‚Äì Senior Java Full Stack Developer (AWS + Angular)
 Location: Atlanta, GA (Onsite)
 
 
 
Role Overview
We are seeking an experienced Senior Java Full Stack Developer with strong AWS cloud expertise to join our team in Atlanta, GA. The ideal candidate will have 8‚Äì10+ years of experience in enterprise application design and development using Java, Spring Boot, Quarkus, Angular, and microservices architecture. The role includes development, deployment support, triaging issues, and collaboration across cross-functional teams in an Agile environment.
 
 
Key Responsibilities
Develop high-performance services and applications based on detailed design and functional specifications.
Collaborate with internal and cross-functional technical teams to deliver features on time and to expectations.
Review functional and technical design documents and translate requirements into development tasks.
Perform unit testing via endpoints and integration testing at the module level.
Support production deployments, including triage of reported issues and prioritization of enhancements.
Handle change requests, enhancements, and bug fixes post-production as per client requirements.
Follow Agile development practices including sprint planning, standups, code reviews, and retrospectives.
Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Git-based toolchains and modern DevOps practices.
Ensure application reliability, scalability, and performance through effective development, optimization, and monitoring.
 
 
Required Skills & Experience
Technical Experience:
8‚Äì10+ years hands-on experience in:
Java / J2EE
Spring Boot
Quarkus
API and microservices development
Strong hands-on experience with AWS cloud services, including:
Serverless solutions
ROSA OpenShift
Elasticache (preferred)
Aurora
PostgreSQL
Front-end development experience using:
Angular (13+)
JavaScript / TypeScript
Modern tooling (npm, angular-cli, etc.)
Experience designing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Git-based toolchains.
Experience with Oracle databases.
Additional Technical Skills:
Experience with monitoring tools like Dynatrace, Sumo Logic, etc.
Strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and object-oriented programming.
Working knowledge of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) and Test-Driven Development (TDD).
 
 
Essential Soft Skills
Ability to work effectively in an Agile/Scrum environment.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to triage issues, manage priorities, and deliver solutions in fast-paced environments.
Collaborative mindset with a focus on outcomes and delivery excellence.


 

Jitendra Singh
Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com


Job Description ‚Äì SQL Developer
Location: Chicago,IL


Role Overview
We are seeking a strong SQL Developer with solid database and data migration expertise. The ideal candidate will be responsible for database development, data validation, report development, and supporting data-related initiatives in an Agile environment.
 
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and optimize SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and other database components.
Work with complex data models and concepts including schema design, SCD logic, table structures, and performance tuning.
Participate in data migration initiatives, including data validation, transformation logic, and end-to-end testing.
Collaborate with business analysts and stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and support report development.
Work in an Agile delivery team, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, retrospectives, and backlog refinement.
Perform root-cause analysis for data issues and provide timely resolutions.
Ensure data accuracy, consistency, and integrity across platforms and environments.
 
 
Required Skills & Experience
Strong SQL expertise with hands-on experience on any major database platform (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc.).
Strong understanding of database concepts, including:
Schemas
SCD (Slowly Changing Dimensions) logic
Stored Procedures
Views
Data structures and relational modeling
Experience in testing or delivering data migration projects.
Experience working in Agile development methodologies.
 
Preferred Skills
Experience in any reporting or BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, Cognos, Qlik, etc.).
Familiarity with ETL tools or data integration frameworks.
 
Soft Skills
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Good communication skills and stakeholder engagement capabilities.




Jitendra Singh
Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

job_description:
Job Title: Full Stack Java Engineer (W2 Only)
Location: Jersey City, NJ (Hybrid - Relocation fine)
Duration: 12+ Months
Client: Investments
Interview Process
Local candidates: In-Person
Non-local candidates: Single Zoom interview (one-and-done)

Experience: Minimum 10+ years required
H1B OK (must transfer the Visa)
Relocation: Accepted with strong LinkedIn profile
 
Nice-to-Have: AWS
Project: Geneva Decommissioning ‚Äì FIT Team

Position Overview
We are seeking a strong full-stack Java engineer to support applications within the prime brokerage business at Fidelity. This role focuses on backend engineering with Java, Spring Boot, APIs, SQL, and AWS deployment experience. Minimal UI work is required.

You will work within a team of skilled technologists building applications, services, and data structures critical to hedge fund clients and Fidelity‚Äôs prime brokerage operations.

Key Responsibilities
Design and develop applications supporting prime brokerage business functions.
Build and enhance APIs and microservices using Java and Spring Boot.
Create and analyze data structures supporting new features and applications.
Work with message queues and integrations using APIs.
Contribute to the full development lifecycle‚Äîfrom concept to deployment.
Collaborate in a fast-paced, Agile environment to deliver high-quality solutions.
Deploy applications to AWS and work with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/Maven).
Participate in cross-functional discussions and offer ideas to improve products.

Required Skills & Experience
10+ years of hands-on software development experience.

Strong expertise in:
Core Java
Spring Boot
Relational Databases (Oracle, MS SQL Server)
Proficient in SQL (queries, stored procedures, views).
Experience with HTML and JavaScript (UI basics only).
Hands-on experience with Jenkins and/or Maven.
Experience using GitHub for source code management.
Strong data analysis skills and experience in financial services are preferred.
Comfortable working in Linux/Unix environments.
Experience working within Agile/Scrum teams.

Nice-to-Have Skills
AWS cloud deployment experience.
Kafka or other messaging systems.
Python exposure.
Capital Markets / Prime Brokerage domain knowledge.
Familiarity with financial terminologies, glossaries, and workflows.

Soft Skills
Strong communication with both technical and business teams.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively.
Quick learner, adaptable, with a proactive attitude.
Commitment to quality and timely delivery.
Strong team player.

Reach me on ishraque@vyzeinc.com

Role Overview
Seeking a highly skilled Java AWS Microservices Engineer to join our onsite team. The ideal candidate will have strong hands-on experience building scalable microservices, deploying applications on AWS, and automating infrastructure using Terraform.
 
Key Responsibilities
 
- Design, develop, and maintain Java-based microservices using Spring Boot.

Nice to Have
 
- Knowledge of Kafka, RabbitMQ, or other messaging systems.
- Experience with monitoring tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Prometheus, ELK, Grafana).
